name: MLSplitStrategy
desc: Data partitioning approaches, typically for creating a validation dataset from a training dataset.

items.name: case automatic
items.desc: Create ML automatically decides how much of your training dataset it uses for a validation dataset.

items.name: case fixed(ratio: Double, seed: Int?)
items.desc: Create ML uses a portion of your training dataset to create a validation dataset based on the ratio.

items.name: func timestampSeed() -> Int
items.desc: Creates a deterministic number from the current system time to seed random-number generators.

items.name: func resolve(count: Int) -> (ratio: Double, seed: Int)
